name: Chill Town (Kendy2008)
description:
Chill Town

Build a city to your heart's content while chilling to some calming music!

Chill Town is a city builder where the aim is to become the best city for people to live in. Level up your city to get more land and new buildings to aid in your city's prosperity!

The game does not feature save system right now. So exiting the game will clear all of your progress. I suggest taking a picture in you want to.

Trello Board: https://trello.com/b/gA5JADfD/chill-town-development

Developed by: LeafType Studios
